question: Which sentence uses the correct form of 'their', 'there', or 'they're'?
Choose the correct word: 'She _____ going to the party.'
Select the sentence with proper use of the present perfect tense.
Which sentence is written in the future continuous tense?
choice1: She is going to the party.
choice2: She will be going to the party.
choice3: She has gone to the party.
answer: She will be going to the party.
